name: Barman 2. New adventures
description:
KEEP CALM and BE A BEST BARMAN.

Simple and very fascinating game. This will keep you busy for a long time!
Satisfy thirst of all guests and send them home, or they will reach you.
Fill the mugs and slide drinks over the bar but watch out, make sure there is someone to pick them up.
Collect all empty mugs before they fall down the end of the bar.
Hold on the screen to move barman. Use a special features to win.

Features of game:
- Huge number of levels
- Hold on the screen to move barman
- Use a super mug to send home all guests behind one rack
- Use the Keg. Put it on a rack and give to drink 8 visitors!
- Use the "Two hands" barman. Catch the empty mugs from both racks
- Added an extra life for 70 points
- Added the super mug, keg or "Two hands" barman for 30 points
